relevant_findings.general: well-appearing woman in no acute distress, lying in bed comfortably
relevant_findings.heent: AT/NC, EOMI, PERRL, anicteric sclera, pink conjunctiva, patent nares, MMM, good dentition
relevant_findings.neck: nontender supple neck, no LAD, no JVD
relevant_findings.cardiac: RRR, S1/S2, no murmurs, gallops, or rubs
relevant_findings.lung: CTAB, no wheezes, rales, rhonchi, breathing comfortably without use of accessory muscles
relevant_findings.abdomen: mildly distended, normoactive BS, mildly tender at umbilicus and RUQ, no rebound/guarding
relevant_findings.extremities: moving all extremities well, no cyanosis, clubbing or edema
relevant_findings.skin: warm and well perfused, no excoriations or lesions, no rashes
